rows.label: tlk45500153_03_msg0001
rows.name:
Here's a bit of gossip I heard
at the baths.

rows.label: tlk45500153_03_msg0002
rows.name:
You know there's an old factory
around the Superbia Divine Beast's chest?

rows.label: tlk45500153_03_msg0003
rows.name:
Apparently someone was secretly
using that place to manufacture
a ton of artificial Blades!

rows.label: tlk45500153_03_msg0004
rows.name:
My old man reckoned some group
called Lindwurm had bought up a
bunch of them.

rows.label: tlk45500153_03_msg0005
rows.name:
But nobody seems to know where
they've got to now.
